articles.author: Chris Harris
articles.title: ‘Captain America: Brave New World’ triumphs with $40M sales on first day - New York Post
articles.description: Marvel’s Anthony Mackie-helmed action flick “Captain America: Brave New World” generated $40 million in first-day receipts in the United States.
articles.content:
The new Captain America is the new box office champ.
Marvel’s Anthony Mackie-helmed action flick “Captain America: Brave New World” generated $40 million in first-day receipts in the United States, … [+1921 chars]
